title: VMware Workstation unity operation request Null Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to deny service on vulnerable installations of VMware Workstation. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on a guest OS in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the unity.operation.request RPC function. A crafted request can trigger the dereference of a null pointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition to users of the guest OS.
addtionnal_details: VMware has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2018-0013.html
